title: Mastering NextJS
author: Lee Robinson
text: A free video course for building static and server-side rendered applications with Next.js and React.

title: Design with Tailwind CSS Masterclass
author: Adam Wathan
text: Design with Tailwind CSS is a series that teaches you how to build fully responsive, professionally designed UIs from scratch using Tailwind CSS.

title: Netflix Clone - React Tutorial - Styled Components - Firebase
author: Karl Hadwen
text: In this React Tutorial, we will build a Netflix clone! This React project has multiple pages: Home, Browse (which uses Firebase authentication), sign in, and sign up. The sign in will connect to Firebase when a user tries to sign in, and when a user signs up, we will use Firebase auth to store the user in the Firebase auth database.

title: Instagram Clone - React Tutorial - Tailwind CSS - Firebase - React Testing Library
author: Karl Hadwen
text: In this React Tutorial, we will build an Instagram clone! This React project has multiple pages: login, sign up, dashboard (to view/like/comment on photos), and user profiles. The sign-in page will connect to Firebase when a user tries to sign in, and when a user signs up, we will use Firebase auth to store the user in the Firebase auth database.
